org.smartfrog.sfcore.parser
Interface ReaderLanguageParser

All Known Implementing Classes:
SFParser
public interface ReaderLanguageParser

Defines the actual low-level parser interface. Objects that implement this interface provide the means to parse SmartFrog text into component descriptions.

Method Summary
 Phases sfParse(java.io.Reader reader)
          Parses component(s) from a reader.
 Phases sfParse(java.io.Reader reader, java.lang.String codebase)
          Parses component(s) from a reader.

          Parses any value from a reader.
 java.lang.Object sfParsePrimitiveValue(java.io.Reader reader)
          Parses a primitive value from a reader.
 ReferencePhases sfParseReference(java.io.Reader reader)
          Parses a reference from a reader.
 java.lang.Object sfParseTags(java.io.Reader reader)
          Parses tags from a reader.
 

Method Detail

sfParse

Phases sfParse(java.io.Reader reader)
               throws SmartFrogParseException
Parses component(s) from a reader. Returns a root component which contains the parsed components. Includes should be handled by some default include handler.

Parameters:
reader - the reader to parse and compile from
Returns:
root component containing parsed component(s)
Throws:
SmartFrogParseException - error parsing stream

sfParse

Phases sfParse(java.io.Reader reader,
               java.lang.String codebase)
               throws SmartFrogParseException
Parses component(s) from a reader. Returns a root component which contains the parsed components. Includes should be handled by some default include handler.

Parameters:
reader - the reader to parse and compile from
codebase - an optional codebase where the include may be found. If null, use the default code base
Returns:
root component containing parsed component(s)
Throws:
SmartFrogParseException - error parsing stream

sfParseReference

ReferencePhases sfParseReference(java.io.Reader reader)
                                 throws SmartFrogParseException
Parses a reference from a reader. Used by components and developers to quickly build references from a string (eg. sfResolve in Prim)

Parameters:
reader - the reader to parse and compile from
Returns:
parsed reference
Throws:
SmartFrogParseException - failed to parse reference

sfParseAnyValue

java.lang.Object sfParseAnyValue(java.io.Reader reader)
                                 throws SmartFrogParseException
Parses any value from a reader. (the meaning of "any" is language dependant)

Parameters:
reader - the reader to parse and compile from
Returns:
parsed value
Throws:
SmartFrogParseException - failed to parse any value

sfParsePrimitiveValue

java.lang.Object sfParsePrimitiveValue(java.io.Reader reader)
                                       throws SmartFrogParseException
Parses a primitive value from a reader. (the meaning of primitive is language dependant)

Parameters:
reader - the reader to parse and compile from
Returns:
parsed value
Throws:
SmartFrogParseException - failed to parse primitive value

sfParseTags

java.lang.Object sfParseTags(java.io.Reader reader)
                             throws SmartFrogParseException
Parses tags from a reader.

Parameters:
reader - the reader to parse and compile from
Returns:
parsed value
Throws:
SmartFrogParseException - failed to parse tags
